Package ooga.model.components

Interface Board

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameBoard
public interface Board
The board used to house all of the GamePieces

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addPiece​(GamePiece newPieceType)
    This method will add a GamePiece with a previously defined Coordinate to the Board This method assumes that the GamePiece has a previously defined Coordinate
    boolean movePiece​(Coordinate startingCoordinate, Coordinate endingCoordinate)
    This method will move the GamePiece from the starting Coordinate to the ending Coordinate
    void removePiece​(Coordinate coordinate)
    This method will remove the GamePiece from the board at the Coordinate given This method does not return a value, for no matter what, after this method is called there will not be a GamePiece at the Coordinate called

  • Method Details

    • movePiece

      boolean movePiece​(Coordinate startingCoordinate, Coordinate endingCoordinate)
      This method will move the GamePiece from the starting Coordinate to the ending Coordinate
      Parameters:
      startingCoordinate - the Coordinate where the GamePiece to move resides
      endingCoordinate - the Coordinate to move the GamePiece to
      Returns:
      whether or not the move was successful

    • removePiece

      void removePiece​(Coordinate coordinate)
      This method will remove the GamePiece from the board at the Coordinate given This method does not return a value, for no matter what, after this method is called there will not be a GamePiece at the Coordinate called
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the Coordinate of the GamePiece to remove

    • addPiece

      boolean addPiece​(GamePiece newPieceType)
      This method will add a GamePiece with a previously defined Coordinate to the Board This method assumes that the GamePiece has a previously defined Coordinate
      Parameters:
      newPieceType - this is the GamePiece to add to the Board
      Returns:
      whether or not the GamePiece was successfully added to the Board
